title: Global distribution systems : company revenues 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 3 number of Companys.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
Company Travelport has 2.37 times less Revenue in billion U.S. dollars than Company Amadeus which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 5.81 is found at Company Amadeus and the minimum is found at Travelport where Company is 2.45.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 3 number of Companys.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
Company Travelport has 2.37 times less Revenue in billion U.S. dollars than Company Amadeus which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 3 number of Companys.
Company Amadeus has the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars and Travelport has the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Revenue in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 3.36.
The highest value 5.81 at Amadeus is almost 1.47 times larger than the average value 3.95.
Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 11.86.
